channel.title: Daegu on Travel.Sleep.Repeat
channel.description: Recent content in Daegu on Travel.Sleep.Repeat

item.title: Catching Up in Daegu
item.description: We only stopped in Daegu for a couple of nights as we were meeting up with a friend (who we met on a cooking class in Chiang Mai). Again we booked another ‘love hotel’ as they’re usually the cheapest types of accommodation. Unlike Busan this one had a really tacky feel but given the location it sufficed. Our cheesy room at Prince Motel Still feeling burned out from our experience in Busan we didn’t really explore Daegu much.
